• RedisCacheTest
    • setUp
    • test_integration
   1 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
   2 
   3 from __future__ import absolute_import
   4 
   5 from sentry.cache.redis import RedisCache, ValueTooLarge
   6 from sentry.testutils import TestCase
   7 
   8 
   9 class RedisCacheTest(TestCase):
  10     def setUp(self):
  11         self.backend = RedisCache()
  12 
  13     def test_integration(self):
  14         self.backend.set("foo", {"foo": "bar"}, 50)
  15 
  16         result = self.backend.get("foo")
  17         assert result == {"foo": "bar"}
  18 
  19         self.backend.delete("foo")
  20 
  21         result = self.backend.get("foo")
  22         assert result is None
  23 
  24         with self.assertRaises(ValueTooLarge):
  25             self.backend.set("foo", "x" * (RedisCache.max_size + 1), 0)
